H2.text: who is louisiana state senator. David Vitter

H3.text: who is louisiana state senator. Mary Landrieu

A4.text: David Vitter served as a United States Senator from Louisiana from 2005 to 2017.

A5.text: Vitter was re-elected as Louisiana Senator, defeating his Democratic rival, Melancon, on November 4, 2010.
